name: Gazoop
0:
”Alexa, ask gazoop if they have responded to my support request”
”Alexa, ask gazoop how many jobs I had last week?”
”Alexa, ask gazoop to show my active jobs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gazoop
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Gazoop Alexa Application allows customers to manage their accounts and their fleets. This includes checking their Gazoop support tickets, checking active bookings, future bookings, drivers available, jobs in the queue, and making adjustments where required.

This skill currently benefits customers of the Gazoop Dispatch System.
